title: Quarkus 2.14.1.Final released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released Quarkus 2.14.1.Final with some bugfixes and documentation improvements on top of our 2.14.0.Final release. It is a recommended upgrade for anyone already using 2.14. If you are not already using 2.14, please refer to our migration guide. GraalVM/Mandrel upgrade We donâ€™t usually upgrade GraalVM/Mandrel in a micro...
